content: Home | Derek Ruths top of pageProfessor, Innovator, CommunicatorDerek RuthsRESEARCHDerek is interested in how AI and data science can solve society-scale challenges. This often involves going beyond AI innovation and delving deep into the underlying questions.Learn MoreOUTREACHAI, data science, and data are powerful tools.
